sections.MISSION:
1/2CR Reconnaissance Platoon conducts M4 day qualification and night familiarization on 03-04 April 2024 on RG 124/126 to build confidence in primary weapon systems and improve combat readiness.

sections.PURPOSE: of this range is to provide the Reconnaissance Platoon with the opportunity to participate in advanced marksmanship training utilizing the M4/PEQ-15, as well as nighttime familiarization.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Conduct zero and standard M4 qualification
Conduct nighttime familiarization training
Conduct short and long-range training
sections.END STATE:
The Reconnaissance Platoon successfully conducts M4/PEQ-15 advanced marksmanship training both during the day and at night. Each soldier within the platoon will gain increased confidence in their primary weapon system and in themselves.
Training Objectives
Conduct M4 TBL V and VI Qualification on Day 1
Conduct PEQ-15 training and boresight procedures
Conduct PEQ-15 zero
Conduct night familiarization Conduct NVD modified qualification on Night 1
Conduct both long and short-range training on Day 2
